name: WhatsApp for PC - Whatsapple Client
summary: WhatsApp Desktop client for Windows ,Linux and Mac
short_description:
WhatsApple - is WhatsApp client for PC, It can be described simply as WhatsApp for PC . It enables user to use WhatsApp Chat services on PC through Simple and Easy to use Messenger - Pidgin. All the settings and Configuration is pre-built, Just enter your Number and Verification code and Enjoy WhatsApp messaging experience on Windows/Linux/Mac OS.

Steps 

1.Generate Password through bundled Password Generator, enter the number with country code.

2. Use the generated Password in the WhatsApple chat client :) to start chatting :)


Visit the below Article for Configuration tutorial with Screenshots
